attributes.additional_details:
I am appalled at the excessive profits made by companies which provide the essential basics of life e.g. food, utilities, oil.

This is having a detrimental affect on our country and causing significant worry and stress particularly for the most vulnerable in our society.

I strongly encourage you to write to your MP to lobby for legislation to counteract the excessive profits being made. Perhaps it maybe worthwhile considering limiting the percentage of profits which can be
made like they do in France.
